## Facet plots

<details><summary>*Click here to show setup code.*</summary>
```{r include = FALSE}
### Facet plots

```
```{r 15-setup-15-facet-r}
library(tidyverse)
```
</details>


```{r include = FALSE}
# facet_wrap()
```
```{r 15-facet-wrap}
ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ class)
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# facet_grid()
```
```{r 15-facet-grid}
ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(year ~ drv)
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# facet_grid() only set rows
```
```{r 15-facet-grid-only-set-rows}
ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(vars(year))
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# facet_grid() only set cols
```
```{r 15-facet-grid-only-set-cols}
ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(year))
```
